# coder tokens create


Create a tokens

## Usage
```console
coder tokens create [flags]
```


## Local Flags
| Name |  Default | Usage | Environment | 
| ---- |  ------- | ----- | -------- |
| --lifetime |720h0m0s |<code>Specify a duration for the lifetime of the token.</code> | <code>$CODER_TOKEN_LIFETIME</code>  |
